trans-unit.source: Provides pixel format conversion functionality for a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供的像素格式轉換功能<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: FormatConvertedBitmap implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: FormatConvertedBitmap 實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>

trans-unit.source: Property changes can occur only during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: 只有在物件初始設定期間發生屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>發出信號，初始設定開始和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>來表示已完成初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: FormatConvertedBitmap objects created using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette%2CSystem.Double%29> constructor are automatically initialized, and property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 使用建立的 FormatConvertedBitmap 物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette%2CSystem.Double%29>建構函式會自動初始化，並且忽略屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette%2CSystem.Double%29>

trans-unit.source: For format conversions between RGB color spaces with different characteristics, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> class should be used.
trans-unit.target: RGB 色彩空間與不同的特性之間的格式轉換為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>應該使用類別。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: Conversions between color spaces need a source color profile and destination color profile for gamut mapping to provide a reliable color conversion.
trans-unit.target: 色彩空間之間的轉換需要來源色彩設定檔及目的色域圖對應，以提供可靠的色彩轉換的色彩設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The color profiles are provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext> parameters of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%2A> or by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.DestinationColorContext%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.SourceColorContext%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 色彩設定檔所提供的<xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>參數<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.DestinationColorContext%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.SourceColorContext%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.SourceColorContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.DestinationColorContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>

trans-unit.source: Metadata tags related to image data must be updated if an image is saved to a file after a transform is applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果映像儲存到檔案後套用轉換，則必須更新映像資料相關的中繼資料標記。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize></xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>使用這個建構函式所建立，您必須執行之間的屬性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> class that has the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source*>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>類別具有指定<> *>， <> </> *>， <> </> *>，以及<> *>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>使用這個建構函式建立的物件會自動初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source*>新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*>新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> instance if `destinationFormat` is an indexed format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*>新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>執行個體如果`destinationFormat`是索引的格式。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold*>新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alpha channel threshold of a bitmap when converting to palletized formats that recognizes an alpha color.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定點陣圖的 alpha 色板閾值，轉換成辨識 alpha 色彩的 palletized 格式時。

trans-unit.source: The AlphaThreshold value is used to determine what level of opacity will be mapped to the fully transparent color in the converted format.
trans-unit.target: AlphaThreshold 值用來判斷何種不透明度層級將會對應至已轉換的格式完全透明的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A value of 9.8 implies that any pixel with an alpha value of less than 25 will be mapped to the transparent color.
trans-unit.target: 值為 9.8 表示小於 25 的 alpha 值的所有像素，將會對應至的透明色彩。

trans-unit.source: A value of 100 maps all pixels which are not fully opaque to the transparent color.
trans-unit.target: 100 的值會對應所有不是完全透明的色彩不透明的像素。

trans-unit.source: The destination palette should provide a transparent color; otherwise, the transparent color will be the one closest to zero, often black.
trans-unit.target: 目的調色盤應該提供透明的色彩。否則，透明的色彩會是最接近零，通常是黑色。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel threshold for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個的 alpha 色板閾值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0.0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 表示的開始<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>初始化。

trans-unit.target: BeginInit 之間必須進行屬性初始化和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>已初始化，屬性變更會被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> is currently being initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"> </xref>目前正在初始化。

trans-unit.source: BeginInit has already been called.
trans-unit.target: 已經呼叫 BeginInit。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: -或- <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"> </xref>已經初始化。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the pixel format to convert the bitmap to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要轉換點陣圖的像素格式。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The pixel format to apply to the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至點陣圖的像素格式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Pbgra32*>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Pbgra32*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Pbgra32*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the palette to apply to the bitmap if the format is indexed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要套用至點陣圖，如果格式已編製索引的調色盤。

trans-unit.source: You must set this property if you want to use an indexed pixel format for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定此屬性，如果您想要使用索引像素格式<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The destination palette to apply to the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至點陣圖的目的調色盤。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 表示的結束<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>初始化。

trans-unit.source: Property initialization must be done between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit calls, as demonstrated in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 必須之間進行屬性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和 EndInit 呼叫，如下列範例所示。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>已初始化，屬性變更會被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -or- The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*> property is an indexed format and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -or- The palette colors do not match the destination format. -or- The EndInit method is called without first calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit*>.
trans-unit.target: The <>*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -或- <> </> *> 屬性是索引的格式和<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。 -或者-調色盤色彩不符合目的格式。 -或-呼叫 EndInit 方法時沒有先呼叫<> *>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定點陣圖的來源。

trans-unit.source: You can chain a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> to another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by setting the Source property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> that you want.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將鏈結<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>到另一個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>來源屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>至<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>您想。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Chain BitmapSource Objects Together](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for an example of chaining.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[如何︰ 鏈結 BitmapSource 物件一起](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)鏈結的範例。

trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The source for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖來源。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source*>
